page.title: 14CONCLUSION
page.content: The work on the Domesday Project was undertaken by sixth form students from Bede Sixth Form College, Billingham during 2 weeks of the Summer Term in 1985. Four member of staff were also involved. The students who participated were: Tom Eddy, Wendy Parvin, Anne-Marie Emerson, Mark Willis, Christopher Ellis, Michelle Breeze, Robert Ryder, Michael Bell, Sarah Hunt, Mark Ranson, Debbie Mansfield, Scott Grainger, Alan Bookless, Emma Oliver, Ian Jarvis, Andrew Hodgson, Stewart Allen, Emma Wilkinson, Jill Lambell, Vicky Biles and Helen Playfor. In parties of 4 or 5 they visited the sites, recorded the data and then compiled the joint reports presented.
